ValidationRule.description: Ensures that user can only progress to the next stage which is Submitted or Discontinue.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='International_Projects_Unit', ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName ), 'Development'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Submitted')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Discontinued')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress to the next stage which is Submitted or mark the opportunity as Discontinued.
